page.title: 10BELMONT GUIDES
page.content: The Belmont{Guides}is one of the{clubs in the area which caters for girls. The Belmont Guides has been meeting for four years.There are thirteen Guides and two leaders.There are several{badges}that the Guides can work towards.The outdoor activities of the Guides are camping,walking,cook outs,games,trekking and stalking.At camp the Guides have to make things and pack bedding rolls.They have made wellie racks.Sometimes they have sing songs. Both{patrols}in Guides are doing a project on Sri Lanka in which they they have to think of ways to help the starving.One of the things that the Kingfisher and Swallow patrols did to help Sri Lanka was to decorate a smartie tube and fill it with 1p coins.
